Lyric:
[by:Hoolmes]
[00:02.00]Photograph (Roanin Elativ Remix)
[00:04.60]Roanin Elativ,Ed Sheeran
[00:09.13]
[00:34.76]Loving can hurt
[00:39.12]Loving can hurt sometimes
[00:43.60]But it's the only thing
[00:46.25]That I know
[00:52.41]When it gets hard
[00:56.39]You know it can get hard sometimes
[01:01.34]It is the only thing makes us feel alive
[01:11.81]We keep this love in a photograph
[01:16.13]We make these memories for ourselves
[01:19.59]Where our eyes are never closing
[01:21.92]Hearts are never broken
[01:24.13]Times forever frozen still
[01:28.28]So you can keep me
[01:31.10]Inside the pocket
[01:32.80]Of your ripped jeans
[01:35.50]Holding me closer
[01:37.80]Till our eyes meet
[01:40.10]You won't ever be alone
[01:15.12]Wait for me to come home（home~home~）
[01:58.43]
[02:41.45]Loving can heal
[02:45.83]Loving can mend your soul
[02:50.29]And it is the only thing
[02:53.70]That I know (know)
[02:58.61]I swear it will get easier
[03:01.35]Remember that with every piece of ya
[03:06.86]And it's the only thing we take with us when we die
[03:18.63]We keep this love in a photograph
[03:22.86]We make these memories for ourselves
[03:26.53]Where our eyes are never closing
[03:28.56]Our hearts were never broken
[03:31.28]And times forever frozen still
[03:52.27]
[04:09.33]Wait for me to come home（home~home~）
[04:23.85]
[05:24.76]I will remember how you kissed me
[05:29.17]Under the lamppost
[05:30.92]Back on 6th street
[05:33.34]Hearing you whisper through the phone
[05:38.15]Wait for me to come home
[05:55.80]Wait for me to come home
